data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Colmenares, Pío A., Tourinho, Ana Lúcia (2016): First Amazonian species of Maracaynatum, with comments on the genus (Opiliones: Laniatores: Samoidae). Zootaxa 4193 (3): 565-572, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4193.3.6|13 occurrences
